data.name: Signature Visa Credit Card
data.description: At BOQ Specialist, we believe it's important to find the credit card that's right for you. Whether you are a doctor, dentist or vet, we have a credit card to match your personal and business needs. Everyone likes to be rewarded. That’s why BOQ Specialist credit cards come with an exciting range of premium benefits. You’ll find it’s easier than expected to earn, enjoy and relax

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product is offered to medical, dental ,veterinary & accounting professionals only

fees.name: Annual Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Deducted from your card account after you activate your card account and then on each anniversary after that
date (unless otherwise advertised)

lendingRates.additionalInfo: There is an interest free period on your card account of up to 55 days on eligible purchases

features.additionalInfo: Split statements - need separate credit cards for business and personal purposes? No problem. We can offer multiple credit cards under one account and split your statements up to simplify life
You can use your credit card to make monthly repayments on select existing contracts or purchase larger assets to grow your rewards points faster
Travel insurance – up to 90 days of extensive international travel insurance when you purchase return tickets for yourself, your spouse or dependent children with your BOQ Specialist credit card
Earn Qantas rewards points on your everyday purchases

1 Frequent Flyer Point for every $1 spent on eligible purchases in Australia up to 10 000 points per month and 0.5 points per $1 thereafter


1.5 Frequent Flyer Points for every $1 spent on eligible international purchases


1 Frequent Flyer Point for every $1 spent on eligible BOQ Specialist finance contracts
Redeem your rewards points for travel, entertainment or merchandise to suit your preference
Exclusive benefits for Signature cardholders - Priority Pass airport lounges and Visa Luxury Hotel Collection
Priority Pass airport lounge access, the primary cardholder is entitled to four complimentary visits to Priority Pass lounges and may bring one guest per visit free of charge per calendar year

Visa Concierge Service - get a helping hand with travel recommendations and local event tickets
Visa Front Line Access - reserve tickets to some of the best shows, concerts and sporting events.
Visa Entertainment - get the hottest entertainment offers including pre-sale tickets and member promotions
Manage your finances easily - our credit card is compatible with financial accounting systems such as XERO and MYOB

Client Service Centre - available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
Enhanced security - your credit card comes with security features including Verified by Visa and Orion. The Orion team monitor accounts 24 hours a day to prevent unauthorised activity on your card
SMS alert service - track your ongoing spend. Set the service to alert you of any transactions over a specified amount or to notify you when you are nearing or over your limit
